overview: i4B is a specialized consulting group in value building for high-potential businesses. We optimize our client’s potential of growth and profitability by focusing on their path to value and by defining appropriate marketing and financial strategies. We stand out by a comprehensive expertise in Marketing Strategy and Corporate Finance. Each project we put our energy in is viewed through this combinated background. For most of the executives and managers we team up with, we help them both in increasing their sales and their profits. We are fully commited to their success by implementing the best practices in marketing and finance.
